name: The Man With a Boat and a Dream
name_original: The Man With a Boat and a Dream
description:
A game about a lonely fisherman and his will to survive. Charge your harpoon, hit randomly spawning fish, buy upgrades between days, and take down the legendary monster from the depths!

This was put together by the same team that put together Brick Breaker VS (on my page). It was a little more ambitious in terms of features and gameplay, and also contained better basic functionality, like options, pausing, quitting, resolution scaling, etc. It should be noted that I didn't do any art here, kudos to the guy who did.
